thread.title: Police investigate robbery at Rutland bingo hall
thread.title_full: Police investigate robbery at Rutland bingo hall - WCAX.COM Local Vermont News, Weather and Sports-

author: WCAX News
title: Police investigate robbery at Rutland bingo hall
text:
RUTLAND, Vt. - A Rutland bingo hall was robbed Wednesday night.
According to police, a man entered the Immaculate Heart of Mary Bingo Hall on Lincoln Ave. and stole an undisclosed amount of money. He the fled on foot.
The suspect is described as a tall, thin, white man, about 50 years old. Call Rutland City Police if you saw anything.
